title: NBA Opens Investigation Into Phoenix Suns After Toxic Workplace Allegations
sub_head: A report from ESPN said that team owner Robert Sarver used a racial slur and fostered a misogynistic environment. Sarver denied the allegations.
body:
The NBA opened an investigation into the Phoenix Suns on Thursday in response to a new report containing allegations of a toxic workplace cultivated by team owner Robert Sarver, the league said.
The league’s decision to launch an investigation came hours after ESPN published an article in which Sarver, who owns the NBA team and the WNBA’s Phoenix Mercury, was accused of using a racial slur and fostering a misogynistic work environment. Sarver and several team executives denied the allegations.
